TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeneralTransform3DTo2D extends System.Windows.Freezable

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Point> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Rect>. The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> object.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Docs.summary: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the original 3-D bounding box.
Docs.returns: An axis-aligned bounding box that contains all of the points in the specified 3-D bounding box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Docs.summary: Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3DTo2D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
